answers.answer: Hi, the report states that there is evidence of small airway disease which could be causing your symptoms of breathlessness. Here under-ventilation results in reduced perfusion and consequent breathlessness. Bronchodilators may help relieve the symptoms. Besides this cardiac disorders and certain systemic disorders like anemia, diabetes, vitamin deficiencies and thyroid disorders can cause these symptoms. Discuss these options with your doctor when you happen to meet him next time. Regards.
